title: Smeagol, Poor Creature (6C45)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gollum
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Companion
Strength:	3
Vitality:	4
Resistance:	6
Signet:	Frodo
Game Text:	Ring-bound. To play, add a burden. Skirmish: Discard a card from hand to make Smeagol strength +1.
Lore:	”'And we're so lonely… We'll be nice to them, very nice, if they'll be nice to us, won't we, yes, yess.'”
Rarity:	C
